# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Versions currently being supported with security updates.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 2.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.5.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.5   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please create a new issue if you find any security vulnerabilities.
